full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES SHING SHES PAR BRJOD NAS ME TOG GA CHAR 'BEBS PAR BYA'O, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHOD GROGS AEM CHE BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOGS YUL 'DI GAR @010A *, ,ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'JUG KYANG LHA SKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHAR CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MOD, ,RANG RIL LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THAB BSKYED PA DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS, RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU, ,NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS LUG GI BRANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG MCHOD 'BUL BA LA SOGS NI, NOM CHE KO'U SHI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS NI, BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS ZHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
